title: What is an old fashioned American? - Quora

response.answer_text: One that believes in: Liberty for all (not just a few),a smaller (limited) government,fair play,country,family,“living and, for the most part, letting live”,honest, hard, work,ingenuity,integrity,honesty,refusing to be involved in “identity politics”,lending a hand when a neighbor needs it (without reservation).kindness without reciprocal compensation.This is just beginning to “scratches the surface” of what an “Old-fashioned American “ is.
